19 ROSNode::ROSNode(ros::NodeHandle nh) : nh_(nh){
20  odom = nh_.subscribe("/odom", 1000, &ROSNode::odomCallBack, this);
21  camera = nh_.subscribe("/camera/rgb/image_raw", 1000, &ROSNode::cameraCallBack, this);
22  lidarSensor = nh_.subscribe("/sensor", 1000, &ROSNode::lidarCallBack, this);
23  pub_vel = nh_.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("/cmd_vel", 3, false);
24 
25  pub_goal = nh_.advertise<move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal>("/move_base/goal", 3, false);
26 }

34 void ROSNode::odomCallBack(const nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr &msg){ //Type: nav_msgs/Odometry
35  robotMtx_.lock();
36  bot_odom = *msg;
37  robotMtx_.unlock();
